translations: 女高音（soprano 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: I will probably catch up and watch the final season of the Sopranos.
sentences.translation: 我可能会补看一些，会看《黑道家族》的最后一季。

sentences.sentence: Bad guys don't have to be in shape, just look at James Galdofini from The Sopranos.
sentences.translation: 坏小子没必要成为一个固定格式，你只要看看《黑道家族》中的James Galdofini。

sentences.sentence: Remember the bohunk who painted the Sopranos' dining room and wound up getting all flirty with Carmela?
sentences.translation: 还记得为Sopran o家的餐厅喷漆，却与卡梅拉调情的bohunk ？
